snippet: Though the current election season is producing very few goose bumps, the 2012 presidential race is shaping up to be more important to the direction of the country than the 2008 campaign was.
abstract: Though the current election season is producing very few goose bumps, the 2012 presidential race is shaping up to be more important to the direction of the country than the 2008 campaign was.

headline.main: 2012 May Lack Drama, but Not Significance
headline.print_headline: Political Memo: Not the ’08 Campaign, but More May Be at Stake
